name: Parkour Quest Alpha
description:
In this parkour game, you are jumping from block to block and climbing ladders to traverse the environment. If a player misses a block in an attempt to jump, they’ll fall back to the ground and have to jump back to the platform again. You’ll also have to avoid enemies you come across. If you touch an enemy, the game is over. The objective is to reach the goal door.

Controls:

to move left: left arrow key or A key

to move right: right arrow key or D key

to jump: spacebar

to climb up: up arrow key or W key

to climb down: down arrow key or S key
